root: ^I went where you told me and I cleaned out all the creatures.
^Mick: Well done. In fact, I didn't believe you could do it at all. Here's 2000 gold for your service.
^Mick: Now, if you are determined to continue, you need to find Kawa and Anton for the other points. You can find Anton in the camp east of this forest.
^...Kawa usually trains with Pell near the tower east of the village.
